info.title: campeonato-api
info.description: A simple API to create and manage football _(also called soccer)_ championships.

tags.name: miscellaneous
tags.description: Stuff that didn't fit anywhere else.

get.description: Returns a simple **ONLINE** message, useful for checking if the server is up.
Returns an array of every existing `Campeonato`.

post.description: Creates a `Campeonato` from the provided information. Either one of the fields can be unspecified, but at least one **MUST** be specified.

400.description: An error was caused because of the request's inputs. **Check the error message.**

err.example: Nombre must be of type 'string', found number

post.description: Create an empty `Campeonato` from no information. **Requires no data on the request's body.**
Takes all the existing `Equipo`s and matches them up, creating new `Partido`s.

post.summary: Manually calculate the next set of Partidos
post.description: Manually sets off the `calc_next_partidos()` method of the specified `Campeonato`. **This is only available if AutoCalc is off.**

204.description: The next set of `Partido`s was successfully calculated.

400.description: Either the `Campeonato` has _AutoCalc_ on, **or** an error occurred when calculating. **Check the error message.**

schema.example: Campeonato has AUTOCALC on. Partidos will automatically be calculated when the current set is finished.

404.description: There is no `Campeonato` with the specified ID.

example.err: Campeonato with specified ID does not exist

get.summary: Get the winner of a Campeonato.
get.description: Returns the winner of the `Campeonato`. If the winner has yet to be decided returns **null.**

200.description: The winner of the `Campeonato`. **Null** if it has not been decided yet.

404.description: There is no `Campeonato` with the specified ID.

post.summary: Set the result of a Partido
post.description: Sets the result of the specified `Partido`. In case of penalties, 'ganador_penales' can be either '_local_' or '_visitante_'.

400.description: There was an error with the uploaded results, most likely due to an inconsistency (tie and no winner by penalties). Check the error message and fix. **No changes were saved.**

example.err: The winner by penalties was an invalid value. Valid values are 'local' or 'visitante'

404.description: One of the specified IDs was incorrect, and does not exist.

example.err: Campeonato with specified ID does not exist

post.summary: Commit the result of a Partido and advance winner
post.description: Permanently commits the result of a `Partido` and advances the winner. **This action is permanent: once an `Equipo` advances it cannot be changed.**

200.description: The results were committed successfully, and the winner has advanced.

400.description: No winner was defined in the `Partido`, or another error occurred when getting the winner. **Check the error message.**

example.err: The winner of the match is yet to be defined

404.description: One of the specified IDs was incorrect, and does not exist.

example.err: Campeonato with specified ID does not exist

500.description: An internal server error occurred when advancing the winner.

example.err: Whatever internal error happened
